author: Simon Difford
description: Light rum provides vibrancy while aged rum adds rich complexity. Pineapple juice adds tropical fruitiness and replaces the dilution necessary to open and amplify a classic Daiquiri.
name: Pineapple Daiquiri (simple but tasty recipe)
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
